contest-event.event-date:
May 4, 1985 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Journey into Freedom Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Feb. 5, 2011, 11:21 p.m. Jan. 16, 2015, 10:03 a.m. 1 Woodfalls Band Wesley Garner 2 Point of Ayr Colliery Band Trevor Walmsley 3 Newham Band Melvin White 4 Dobcross Silver Band Les Beevers 5 Bedford (Leigh) Band Malcolm Brownbill Unknown Result Cinderford Band Cecil Chappell Unknown Result Greenalls Band John Hudson Unknown Result Solent Concert Band Wesley Garner Unknown Result City of Chester Band Philip Mottershead Unknown Result Rockingham Band John Golland Unknown Result Warburtons Bakery Band Peter Lockett Unknown Result St. Austell Town Band Kenneth Dennison Unknown Result City of Coventry Brass Band Leonard Pepper Unknown Result Blackburn and Darwen Band Gordon Clough Unknown Result Fishburn Band David Loukes Unknown Result Shirland Welfare Band Doug Carlin Unknown Result Stalybridge Old Band Unknown Unknown Result Roberts Bakery Band Colin Cranson Unknown Result Yarwell & Nassington Don Blakeson Unknown Result Hammonds Saltaire Richard Evans Unknown Result BTM Band Cynon Jones Unknown Result Lindley Band Neil Jowett Unknown Result NASUWT Riverside Alan Hope Unknown Result Barrow Shipyard Band William Maginn Unknown Result Luton Band David Baron Unknown Result Yorkley Onward Band Brian Howard
